title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 2280/89 of 24 July 1989 increasing the volume of the Community tariff quota opened by Regulation (EEC) No 4186/88 for certain flat- rolled products
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 2280/89
of 24 July 1989
increasing the volume of the Community tariff quota opened by Regulation (EEC) No 4186/88 for certain flat-rolled products
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The volume of the Community tariff quota opened by Regulation (EEC) No 4186/88 for certain flat-rolled products falling within CN code ex 7226 10 91 shall be raised from 600 to 1 100 tonnes.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1989.
For the Council
The President
H. NALLET
(1) OJ No L 368, 31. 12. 1988, p. 24.
